work_path.description: Local working directory for the pipeline

release_uri.description: Remote storage URI (without trailing slash) where the results will be uploaded. This setting is optional, and if not provided, the results will be stored only locally.

pool_size.description: Number of parallel processes to use for task execution

scratchpad.description:
The scratchpad holds any variables that are used across the steps in the configuration.

You can reference these variables in the steps by using ${variable} notation, e.g.: ${chembl_version}.

 Note: there are some variables PIS that must most likely be set for PIS to work. These are chembl_version, efo_version, and ensembl_version. If these are not set, PIS will not work correctly.

steps.description: List of steps that define the pipeline

additionalProperties.description: List of tasks to execute in the step

name.description: Name of the task. The first word of the task name is the type, which should be a task registered in Otter.
